sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button v-on:click="onRemoveSelected">Remove Selected</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    gridApi: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onRemoveSelected() {
      const selectedNodes = this.gridApi.getSelectedNodes();
      const selectedData = selectedNodes.map(node => node.data);

      if (selectedData.length === 0) {
        alert("삭제할 데이터가 선택되지 않았습니다.");
        return;
      }

      // API 호출로 데이터 삭제
      this.$emit('remove-selected', selectedData);
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 스타일 추가 */
</style>
